root.name: Nova 9: Return of Gir Draxon
root.description: OverviewTaking place after the events of Stellar 7, Nova 9 challenges you to take the role of John Alex and search for the evil Gir Draxon across nine planets. In addition to the tank-based combat of the first game, puzzle elements were added (a change that was not universally welcomed). The experimental Raven II tank can be fitted with various upgrades to help you in your travels.
